title: TJMB Those Jukes My Bad OCE Clan
body:
Hey Boys & Girls 
TJMB is a Oceanic clan with over 30+ Players with TJMB tag and we have over 2 Silver division team and many more growing extremely fast!. Every player in TJMB Is silver and above but doesn't mean we don't accept bronze players, we accept many bronze players and train them with our training programs and many of them end up in silver 1 / Gold plus. If your looking for a laid-back casual clan that is friendly and extremely active then your in luck! We use Skype for communication and facebook page for talking & organisation.

How was TJMB Formed?
TJMB Freya is our clan leader and he got recruited by one of the previous members of TJMB but he recently passed away but before he passed away he told his mate that was next to him to tell Freya to take over the clan, so instantly Freya did and has ran it for about 6 months or so. Freya is a dedicated leader and very flexible and helpful! 

About TJMB:
- TJMB Is a laid-back casual clan that is ONLY looking for players that enjoy the game and very relax! Our ultimate goal is to play in OCE comp & LCS and our short term goal is to have as many teams playing at once. All our members are laid-back casual players and all very respectful, not respectful will be removed instantly from clan. More information please speak to TJMB Freya

We have a TJMB officer that runs our facebook page 24/7
- Www.facebook.com/tjmboce

We have a TJMB officer that's setting up our youtube channel as we speak.
- TBA

We also have a TJMB Roster management officer that creates our rosters and have them done by Sunday afternoon for a Tuesday start (Tuesday - Monday rotate)


(MUST READ)
- We aren't a FULL-serious clan, we are here to have fun and enjoy the game! So if you dont have a sense of humor or anything like that then this clan isn't for you

How to join? 
Speak to TJMB Freya Today!


Clan Leader IGN: TJMB Freya
Clan Leader Skype: supportsforlife
TJMB Facebook page: www.facebook.com/tjmboce

Pictures are 
Challenger Team (Champion select) We recently got offered to trial for a Challenger tier team which few of our players made it in for
Other 2 pictures are Team 1 & 2 games
